sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Review quotation:

lu...li'u = ?
zo = ?
ku'i = ?

(Answers: grammatical quote, single word quote, however)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
nenri x1 is inside/within x2 inside/within
bartu x1 is outside x2 outside

Space as Tense

In Lojban, space is treated like time. Just as pu/ca/ba mark time, vi/va/vu mark spatial distance:

Cmavo Meaning Compare to
vi here (near) ca (now)
va there (mid) —
vu yonder (far) —

Using Spatial Tenses

lo mlatu cu vi cadzu

The cat walks here (nearby).

lo gerku cu va plipe

The dog jumps there (mid-distance).

lo cipni cu vu vofli

The bird flies yonder (far away).

With Position Words

lo mlatu cu nenri vi lo zdani

The cat is inside the house here.

lo gerku cu bartu va lo dinju

The dog is outside the building there.

Key Point

vi/va/vu mark spatial distance from the speaker, just like time tenses mark temporal distance.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use vi/va/vu

Translate:

  1. The dog is here.
  2. The cat walks there.
  3. The bird is far away.
Answers
  1. lo gerku cu vi zvati
  2. lo mlatu cu va cadzu
  3. lo cipni cu vu zvati

Exercise 2: New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. The cat is inside the house.
  2. The dog is outside.
  3. I am inside.
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu nenri lo zdani
  2. lo gerku cu bartu
  3. mi nenri

Exercise 3: Combined

Translate:

  1. The cat is inside here.
  2. The dog is outside there.
  3. I see something far away.
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu nenri vi
  2. lo gerku cu bartu va
  3. mi viska lo vu zvati

items.text: The cat is inside the house.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "The dog is here." → lo gerku cu vi zvati
  2. "The cat is inside." → lo mlatu cu nenri
  3. "I see something far away." → mi viska lo vu zvati

Summary

You learned spatial tenses vi/va/vu and position words nenri/bartu. Space works like time in Lojban.
